mapper.select: SELECT DATASEQ, RULESYSID, FACTORYID, LINEID, SHIFTID, WORK_DATE, OPERATIONID, REJECT_ITEMID, MODELID, FIRSTTIME_REJECT_QTY, REWORK_REJECT_QTY, IMAGES, MOVIES, CREATOR, CREATETIME, EVENT, EVENTUSER, EVENTTIME, ISUSABLE, TID FROM DSP_REJECT_CONTENTS WHERE 1=1 AND FACTORYID = #{factoryid} AND LINEID = #{lineid} AND SHIFTID = #{shiftid} AND WORK_DATE = #{workDate}
